Ice::

She transformed into her semi-bot mode and fell to her knees.  She 
couldn't break her concentration now, despite what Lunarpine said.  
She was about to change the image again when she heard him say 
Veratis.  That broke her train of thought.  Her image in Megaton's 
mind stop and she stared up at him. "What did you say? What's Veratis 
have to do with this?"  She realized she fell for a trick and started 
up the image again.  Only, this time, she put up the image of energon 
bars and caged Megaton inside.  If he tried to reach the bars, he'd 
think he was being shocked. Or at least, she tried to make him think 
this.  The strain was showing and her body was trembling.  Her mind 
started going in differant directions.  Without knowing it, she had 
sent the same image to Lunarpine as well as MegaTon. Her power supply 
was getting low, but she couldn't let Megaton destroy her friends, or 
the bot she cared for.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Megaton didn't understand what could be happening to him, he was 
perfect,
> the ideal Pred. He tried to think logically, how was it that he 
hadn't
> transformed? (He did but Ice's telepathy keeps him from knowing 
it.) He
> turned around to where Ice lay, he knew that either her or 
Lunarpine were
> causing this. He decided to try some more logic, "You haven't told 
them what
> Veratis intends for the Maximals when his army of mutants are 
complete have
> you?"
> 
> Lunarpine rushed to Ice's side, he could see her strain. "I don't 
know what
> you're doing to him but I want you to stop before you hurt 
yourself." His
> concern for her was interupted by Megatons comment about 
Veratis. "Shut up
> monster or I'll show you whats in store for ANY traitor who comes 
around
> me."
